description: Land surface model simulation. Land cover change with grassland crop/pasture except with net transitions instead of gross.  No land management.
keywords: LUMIP, Tier 2, historical, grassland, net transitions, no land management
long_name: historical land-only with net land-use transitions
rationale: Factorial set of land only experiments with increasingly realistic treatment of land management; derivatives of LMIP-hist (LS3MIP).

requirements.keywords: 1850, 2014, Historical, Recent Past, pre-industrial to present, IPCC
requirements.label: 1850-2014 165yrs

requirements.description: Reference forcing data for offline land surface models running the L3MIP historical simulation. Data provided by the LS3MIP.
requirements.label: LMIPHistoricalForcing

requirements.description: Grassland crop/pasture with net transitions instead of gross, no management.
requirements.keywords: LUMIP, grassland, net transitions, no management
requirements.label: GrasslandNet
